This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=CUST-SERV-PRACTITIONERS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-06-02T09:31:54Z Sonya Campbell 2014-06-02T11:31:50+01:00 2014-06-02T11:31:50+01:00 One-Stop-Shop Conference Glasgow June 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CUST-SERV-PRACTITIONERS;ce3e6a1a.1406 Hi all,<br><br>Just a quick reminder that places are now limited for the conference next month. As a result we will be closing registration on Friday 13th of June. If you were still wanting to attend please register at:<br><br>To register for the event please go to the online shop:<br>http://store.gcu.ac.uk/browse/product.asp?compid=1&modid=1&catid=26<br><br>The conference will open at Glasgow Caledonian University on Wednesday the 18th of June with registration on level 1 of the Saltire Centre Library from 12pm. The conference day 2 will be held at the University of Strathclyde and aims to finish by 1pm on the 19th to enable [...] Sonya Campbell 2014-05-19T15:42:28+01:00 2014-05-19T15:42:28+01:00 One-Stop-Shop Conference Glasgow June 2014 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CUST-SERV-PRACTITIONERS;526347e2.1405 Hi all,<br><br>Apologies for cross posting but we wanted to make you aware of this conference being held in partnership between Glasgow Caledonian University and the University of Strathclyde next month. If you could distribute this to any of your departments who may be interested in this conference which brings together Library, IT and student service professionals to discuss the provision of converged services. [...] Fowler C.A. 2014-05-09T13:22:16+00:00 2014-05-09T13:22:16+00:00 Client Services and Support Manager - Job Opportunity at University of Southampton https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CUST-SERV-PRACTITIONERS;e83e1650.1405 (With apologies for cross-posting)<br><br>Please see details below of an opportunity to join University of Southampton Library as Client Services and Support Manager.<br>This new post offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the redevelopment of Library support and services, leading a newly integrated Client Services and Support team. The emphasis of the post is on the review and redevelopment of our services to provide high quality, innovative and accessible support which meets the needs of the increasingly global and mobile university community. We place particular emphasis on the individual user experience.<br>You will be an experienced manager with an [...]
